name: Life is...
description:
Life is...out of control. As much as we try, somethings cannot be controlled. You may do something, but another thing happens. You may think something, but say another.

Hi, I'm Danilo Cheid, from Brazil.

I started developing games as my main graduation and interest.

"Life is..." is my first game made by myself, using very low time and very few resources for a Game Maker's Tool Kit (yt channel) Game Jam.

I hope you try it and like it!
